name: the goodie room
body:
This is a collection of useful libraries, utilities, articles & snippets I've collected over time.

### javascript

* lightweight event api http://millermedeiros.github.com/js-signals/
* full screen api http://brad.is/coding/BigScreen/
* terminal-like console http://www.michalkowalkowski.com/cssConsole/
* extends bootstrap with additional controls http://exacttarget.github.com/fuelux/#
* binding keyboard combos http://robertwhurst.github.com/KeyboardJS/
* vector graphics scripting http://paperjs.org/
* processingjs http://processingjs.org
* 3d physics engine http://schteppe.github.io/cannon.js/
* logic-less templates http://mustache.github.io/
* file and module loader http://requirejs.org/
* functional programming support http://underscorejs.org/
* keyboard shortcut handlers http://craig.is/killing/mice
* cross-browser key-value store http://www.jstorage.info/
* semantic templates (mustache compatible) http://handlebarsjs.com
* parse, validate, manipulate, & format dates http://momentjs.com
* CSS transitions & animations http://h5bp.github.io/Effeckt.css/dist/#0
* in-browser console/logging http://adamschwartz.co/log/
* js uml/sequence diagrams http://bramp.github.io/js-sequence-diagrams/
* backbone webapp framework http://backbonejs.org
* requestAnimationFrame http://www.html5rocks.com/en/tutorials/speed/animations/
* snappy tooltips http://calebjacob.com/tooltipster/
* time series visualization http://square.github.com/cubism
* directed graph renderer https://github.com/cpettitt/dagre
* graph algorithms https://github.com/cpettitt/dig.js
* fast multidimensional filtering for coordinated views http://square.github.io/crossfilter/
* time series data collection & analysis http://square.github.com/cube/
* path finding https://github.com/qiao/PathFinding.js
* generating and manipulating CSS 3D transforms https://github.com/boblemarin/Sprite3D.js

### utilities

* like netcat for websocket https://github.com/progrium/wssh
* command line tool for Mac OS X that generates thumbnails from web pages https://github.com/pokeb/asi-web-thumbnail
* another web page to png https://github.com/paulhammond/webkit2png/
* Archives a webpage as .webarchive without WebKit https://github.com/takebayashi/STWebArchiver
* Obj-C Screensaver with WebKit https://github.com/patrikax/tweetSaver
* convert html to pdf using the webkit rendering engine, and qt https://code.google.com/p/wkhtmltopdf/
* scriptable headless webkit https://github.com/ariya/phantomjs

### java

* automatically annotate mentions of DBpedia resources in text https://github.com/dbpedia-spotlight/dbpedia-spotlight/
* modelling and manipulating 2-dimensional linear geometry http://sourceforge.net/projects/jts-topo-suite/
* general purpose spatial / geospatial library https://github.com/spatial4j/spatial4j
* velocity templating http://projects.apache.org/projects/velocity.html
* ssh(d) http://projects.apache.org/projects/sshd.html
* apache Spatial Information System http://sis.apache.org/
* commons exec http://projects.apache.org/projects/commons_exec.html
* commons daemon http://projects.apache.org/projects/commons_daemon.html
* commons compress http://projects.apache.org/projects/commons_compress.html
* bytecode engineering library http://projects.apache.org/projects/commons_bcel.html
* asm bytecode manipulation and analysis framework http://asm.ow2.org/
* opencv, ffmpeg, libdc1394, pgr flycapture, openkinect, videoinput, artoolkitplus bindings http://code.google.com/p/javacv/
* machine learning library http://projects.apache.org/projects/mahout.html
* detect and extract metadata & structured text http://tika.apache.org/
* deal with crap html http://home.ccil.org/~cowan/XML/tagsoup/
* iterative graph processing system http://giraph.apache.org/
* machine learning based toolkit for the processing of natural language text http://opennlp.apache.org/index.html
* toolkit for building, researching, and studying recommender systems http://lenskit.grouplens.org/
* Search Results Clustering Engine http://project.carrot2.org/
* lingpipe nlp library http://alias-i.com/lingpipe/demos/tutorial/read-me.html
* thumbnail generation library for Java https://code.google.com/p/thumbnailator/
* image processing http://commons.apache.org/imaging/
* image scaling http://www.thebuzzmedia.com/software/imgscalr-java-image-scaling-library/ https://github.com/thebuzzmedia/imgscalr
* more image processing http://marvinproject.sourceforge.net/en/index.html
* runtime super-small, super-fast Java™ compiler http://docs.codehaus.org/display/JANINO/Home
* class reloader for running applications https://code.google.com/p/jreloader/
* Java Optimization Framework http://www.sable.mcgill.ca/soot/
* Interface to invoke Java™ programming language compilers from programs http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/tools/JavaCompiler.html
* Ashes: a Java Compiler Infrastructure http://www.sable.mcgill.ca/ashes/
* Jasmin is a Java Assembler Interface https://github.com/Sable/jasmin
* SableCC is a parser generator http://sablecc.org/
* bytecode generation and disassembly tools https://github.com/cojen/Cojen/wiki
* simple Java bytecode manipulation http://www.csg.ci.i.u-tokyo.ac.jp/~chiba/javassist/
* api for wikipedia data https://code.google.com/p/jwpl/wiki/JWPLDocumentation

### java articles / examples

* http://niklasschlimm.blogspot.com/2012/02/java-7-complete-invokedynamic-example.html
* http://www.slideshare.net/arhan/mastering-java-bytecode-with-asm-33rd-degree-2012
* https://github.com/Sable/jasmin/blob/master/examples/Implementor.j
* https://github.com/Sable/soot/blob/master/tutorial/createclass/Main.java
* http://www.sable.mcgill.ca/soot/doc/index.html
* http://www.sable.mcgill.ca/soot/tutorial/
* http://www.brics.dk/SootGuide/

### solr

* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/FunctionQuery
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/FieldCollapsing
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/Join
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SolrFacetingOverview
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/RealTimeGet
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SpatialSearch
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SolrRelevancyCookbook
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SearchComponent
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SolrQuerySyntax
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/LocalParams
* http://lucene.apache.org/solr/4_0_0/solr-core/org/apache/solr/search/FunctionQParserPlugin.html
* http://lucene.apache.org/solr/4_0_0/solr-core/org/apache/solr/search/FunctionRangeQParserPlugin.html (FRANGE)
* http://searchhub.org/2009/07/06/ranges-over-functions-in-solr-14/
* FIELD VALUE http://lucene.apache.org/solr/4_0_0/solr-core/org/apache/solr/search/FieldQParserPlugin.html
* PREFIX http://lucene.apache.org/solr/4_0_0/solr-core/org/apache/solr/search/PrefixQParserPlugin.html
* NESTEDQ http://lucene.apache.org/solr/4_0_0/solr-core/org/apache/solr/search/NestedQParserPlugin.html
* http://lucene.apache.org/solr/4_0_0/solr-core/org/apache/solr/core/SolrEventListener.html
* http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SolrAdaptersForLuceneSpatial4
* http://searchhub.org/2009/09/02/faceted-search-with-solr/
* Well-known Text (spatial markup) http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Well-known_text
* solr examples https://github.com/ryantxu/spatial-solr-sandbox
* language bindings http://wiki.apache.org/solr/IntegratingSolr

### tika

* http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/opensource/tutorials/os-apache-tika/
* http://www.lucidimagination.com/search/s:lucid/li:site?q=Content+Extraction+with+Tika
* http://wiki.apache.org/tika/3rd%20party%20parser%20plugins
* http://wiki.apache.org/tika/DeveloperResources
* https://github.com/apache/tika/blob/b3a4ac0729c9898d0c02aa344e42ac568ee98995/tika-parsers/src/test/java/org/apache/tika/parser/microsoft/ExcelParserTest.java
* http://tika.apache.org/1.2/parser_guide.html
* http://tika.apache.org/1.2/formats.html#apiorgapachetikaparserhtmlHtmlParser.html
* http://tika.apache.org/1.2/parser.html#apiorgapachetikaparserParser.html
* http://tika.apache.org/1.2/parser.html#apiorgapachetikametadataMetadata.html
* http://tika.apache.org/1.2/parser.html#apidocsorgapachetikaparserAutoDetectParser.html
* http://tika.apache.org/1.2/api/org/apache/tika/language/LanguageIdentifier.html

### javacv

* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/source/browse/src/main/java/com/googlecode/javacv/ObjectFinder.java
* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/source/browse/#git%2Fsamples
* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/source/browse/samples/FacePreview.java
* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/source/browse/samples/FaceApplet.java
* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/source/browse/samples/FaceRecognition.java
* https://code.google.com/p/javacv/w/list
* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/wiki/OpenCV2_Cookbook_Examples
* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/wiki/HowToMakeAnApplet
* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/wiki/ConvertingOpenCV
* http://code.google.com/p/javacv/downloads/detail?name=javacv-examples-20120614-src.zip
* http://ganeshtiwaridotcomdotnp.blogspot.com/2011/12/opencv-javacv-eclipse-project.html
* http://ganeshtiwaridotcomdotnp.blogspot.com/search/label/OpenCV-JavaCV

### objc

* run shell scripts http://stackoverflow.com/questions/412562/execute-a-terminal-command-from-a-cocoa-app/696942#696942
* nstask https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#DOCUMENTATION/Cocoa/Reference/Foundation/Classes/NSTask_Class/Reference/Reference.html
* launch app http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5048677/launching-an-mac-app-with-objective-c-cocoa
* JavaFrameEmbedding example http://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#/legacy/library/samplecode/JavaFrameEmbeddingDemo/Introduction/Intro.html
* cocoa helpers https://github.com/enormego/cocoa-helpers
* Write Cocoa applications in Javascript https://github.com/parmanoir/jscocoa
* build Cocoa applications using WebKit https://github.com/rsms/cocui
* useful Cocoa classes https://github.com/MrNoodle/NoodleKit

### reference

* database operators http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa178407(v=sql.80)

### misc

* moving average, awk: 

```
awk 'BEGIN{sz=5} {mod=NR%sz; if(NR<=sz){count++}else{sum-=array[mod]};sum+=$1;array[mod]=$1;print sum/count}' 
```


### hbase resources

* http://www.slideshare.net/alexbaranau/intro-to-hbase-internals-schema-design-for-hbase-users
* http://www.cloudera.com/resource/hbasecon-2012-learning-hbase-internals/
* http://www.larsgeorge.com/2009/02/mini-local-hbase-cluster.html
* http://www.larsgeorge.com/2009/01/changing-hbase-tables-in-code.html
* https://era.library.ualberta.ca/public/view/item/uuid:4667773a-8015-4c9f-89db-44ca71580c7c
* https://blogs.apache.org/hbase/entry/coprocessor_introduction

### streaming data test sources

* telnet bitcoincharts.com 27007
* wssh -n "ws://websocket.mtgox.com:80/mtgox?Currency=USD"
* bitcoin txns

```
wssh -n ws://api.blockchain.info:8335/inv
{"op":"unconfirmed_sub"}
{"op":"addr_sub", "addr":"$bitcoin_address"}
{"op":"blocks_sub"}
{"op":"ping_block"}
{"op":"ping_tx"}
```

* http://blockchain.info/stats?format=json
* https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/MtGox/API/Streaming
* irc.freenode.net #bitcoin-watch
* irc.freenode.net #bitcoin-market
